mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, wxopenid, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, create_time, last_modified_time, mobile_no, status, user_id, m_openid from wechat_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wechat_user(tenant_id, wxopenid, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, create_time, last_modified_time, mobile_no, status, user_id, m_openid) values (#{tenantId}, #{wxopenid}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{province}, #{city}, #{country}, #{headimgurl}, #{privilege}, #{unionid}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{mobileNo}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{mOpenid})

insert into wechat_user(tenant_id, wxopenid, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, create_time, last_modified_time, mobile_no, status, user_id, m_openid) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.wxopenid}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.country}, #{entity.headimgurl}, #{entity.privilege}, #{entity.unionid}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.mOpenid})

insert into wechat_user(tenant_id, wxopenid, nickname, sex, province, city, country, headimgurl, privilege, unionid, create_time, last_modified_time, mobile_no, status, user_id, m_openid) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.wxopenid}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.country}, #{entity.headimgurl}, #{entity.privilege}, #{entity.unionid}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.mOpenid})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), wxopenid = values(wxopenid), nickname = values(nickname), sex = values(sex), province = values(province), city = values(city), country = values(country), headimgurl = values(headimgurl), privilege = values(privilege), unionid = values(unionid), create_time = values(create_time), last_modified_time = values(last_modified_time), mobile_no = values(mobile_no), status = values(status), user_id = values(user_id), m_openid = values(m_openid)
mapper.update:
update wechat_user
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
wxopenid = #{wxopenid},
nickname = #{nickname},
sex = #{sex},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
country = #{country},
headimgurl = #{headimgurl},
privilege = #{privilege},
unionid = #{unionid},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime},
mobile_no = #{mobileNo},
status = #{status},
user_id = #{userId},
m_openid = #{mOpenid},
where id = #{id}
